lines: Your friends ask you if you would like to be in a rock group.
*selectable_if (false) #TELL THEM YOU WOULD LIKE TO PASS ON THE OFFER
#TELL THEM YOU WOULD LIKE TO PASS ON THE OFFER
Your first task is to come up with a suitable name for such a group. There are several suggestions. Choose the one you like best:
That sounds like a fitting name for a talent of your caliber. Now you must choose a position in the band:
Fine, maestro. Do you want to be:
You certainly have the intelligence needed for this kind of responsibility. Under your leadership the band makes terrific progress. In the coming months:
You win three hundred dollars in a Battle of the Bands contest.
Everyone in the neighborhood signs a petition to keep you from practicing in this state. The petition was first drawn up by your mother.
You "interview" every pretty girl in the school, telling them that you need a "star" for your upcoming rock video production plans.
Your Intellectual characteristic shows that you are not smart enough to be a successful band leader. Without the proper kind of direction, your band is a giant flop!
You take a low profile, but the audience can't resist your star qualities. Those eyes, those long silky locks...Move over Mick Jagger, here comes the new king of rock 'n roll!
You are just doing this to go along with the guys. Soon interest wanes and the band idea is pushed aside.
Please tell me a little bit more about the reason, if you can:
#"I'D RATHER BE DOING SOMETHING MORE INTELLECTUALLY STIMULATING"
#"I DON'T HAVE THE TALENT TO DO THIS SORT OF THING"
So who says you can't be a genius scientist AND a rock and roll star?
Hogwash! Everyone KNOWS you don't need talent to be in a rock group!
O.K., I guess you don't need a reason for everything.
